column5: The Kingfish Cottage has 4 bedrooms and 4 full baths, just a minute's walk from public beach access. This house is spacious but cozy and offers a comfortable, rustic beach experience so close to the water that you can smell the salt in the air as you experience sunrise from the porch.  The beach house is close to the city center, a laundromat, restaurants and dining, tourist shops, and dozens of Pok√©stops. Includes comfy beds with linens, Wi-Fi, cable TV, and full kitchen facilities.
